article.headline: Texas Southern 65, Ark Pine Bluff 53
article.story: HOUSTON (AP) -- Christopher Moore scored 17 points, including seven from the free-throw line, to help lead Texas Southern to a 65-53 win over Arkansas-Pine Bluff on Monday night. Jacques Jones added 16 points and had a team-high 14 rebounds for his first double-double of the season for the Tigers (4-15, 2-5 Southwestern Athletic). Sean Walker had 15 points and 10 rebounds. The Tigers, who made only 36 percent of their field goals, led 35-27 at the half. Phillip Brooks scored 14 points, including three 3-pointers for the Golden Lions (6-9, 3-4). Martese Coleman had a team-high six rebounds for Arkansas-Pine Bluff, which made 34 percent of its field goals.
